top.author: @jeanieforreal
top.text: @sainsburys absolutely terrible service today ordered a chop chop delivery at 11.23 ..12.40 no update ..customer service disconnected my call ..when I called back they said the store couldn't find a courier then said to hope for the best ?!! My order was then cancelled via email
top.translationZh: @sainsburys 今天的服务简直烂到家了，11点23分下单要急速配送，12点40分了还没动静，客服直接挂我电话。我再打过去，他们说门店找不到配送员，然后让我"祈祷好运"？！！最后直接给我发邮件取消订单了

top.author: @ginji_ginji

top.author: @jimgris
top.text: All those annoying and childish emojis is enough to drive anyone nuts, my goodness. Impossible to search for stuff. Gave up on that ages ago. If I need to archive important content from a conversation I scrape it from the app and dump it into a text email to strip off all the

top.author: @gmail
top.text: Good morning. Did you encounter any issues while using Gmail? If so, I’ll look into whether there’s any guidance I can provide, so please reply with the details of the situation and the device you’re using. Also, feel free to make use of this help page. http:// goo.gle/3qoFni9

top.author: @DaveTaylor
top.text: Didja know? Facebook automatically hides DM requests from unknown users, typically marking it all as spam. But it might not be! Here's how to check your DM inbox and make sure legit messages haven't been misdirected... https:// askdavetaylor.com/how-to-check-f or-spam-dms-in-facebook-messenger/ … #messenger @facebook @messenger
top.translationZh: 你知道吗？Facebook会自动隐藏陌生用户发来的私信请求，通常都被标记为垃圾信息。但其实可能不是！教你如何查看私信收件箱，确保正常消息没有被误判... https://askdavetaylor.com/how-to-check-for-spam-dms-in-facebook-messenger/ … #messenger @facebook @messenger

top.author: @nomorobo
top.text: Drowning in fake delivery alerts and sketchy texts? Spam Text Blocker filters spam, scams, and smishing texts before they hit your inbox so you tap less and trust more. Start blocking on iPhone and Android: https:// nomorobo.com/spam-text-bloc ker-app/ … #SpamTexts #CyberSecurity
top.translationZh: 被虚假配送通知和可疑短信搞得头大？垃圾短信拦截器能在垃圾信息、诈骗短信和钓鱼短信进入收件箱之前就过滤掉，让你少点击多安心。iPhone和安卓都能用：https://nomorobo.com/spam-text-blocker-app/ … #SpamTexts #CyberSecurity

top.author: @nikko_boss
top.text: 【日光企画 浮間本社ニュース】 2024年12月末までにご入稿頂き、弊社に残っている保管在庫の処分について。 対象のお客様へメールにて順次ご連絡差し上げております。ご希望の方法をご返信ください。 2026年3月7日までにご連絡が付かない方は大変申し訳ないですが、弊社にて処分対応となります。
requestPatterns: (希望|想要|要是能|功能|需求|期待|能不能|建议|最好|求推荐|有没有)
top.translationZh: 【日光企划 浮间本社消息】关于2024年12月底前提交稿件且仍存放在我司的库存处理事宜。我们正在逐一邮件联系相关客户，请回复您希望的处理方式。如果到2026年3月7日前仍无法取得联系，非常抱歉我们将自行处理这些库存。

如果你有空闲时间，下一步就是写邮件发给对方。这里同样不用自己打字，直接让Gemini帮你发到Gmail就行 (3/4)

步骤：
❶ 查看之前提取的空闲时间段列表
❷ 继续操作

top.author: @Matt_Warren
top.text: it was 98% done in one shot, here was the prompt: I want to create an AI customer support helper who will monitor a Gmail account every 5 minutes for new emails. It will categorize every email that comes in to be spam, sales emails, or legitimate customer questions and concerns.
top.translationZh: 基本一次就搞定了98%，提示词是这样的：我想创建一个AI客服助手，每5分钟监控一次Gmail账户的新邮件。它会对收到的每封邮件进行分类，判断是垃圾邮件、销售邮件，还是真正的客户问题和反馈。

top.author: @Inigoplrnz
top.text: A lot of roofing conversations start through email. This AI inbox system helps organize incoming messages and keeps important inquiries easy to find, so reviewing emails becomes quicker and more structured. Send me a DM if you want to see a quick demo.

top.author: @Matt_Warren
top.text: todays side project - AI customer support. connect gmail account + slack + shopify + knowledge-base + AI. check email, classify as support/sales/spam every 5 minutes propose reply in slack with approve/edit/reject actions.
top.translationZh: 今天的小项目 - AI客服系统。连接gmail邮箱 + slack + shopify + 知识库 + AI。每5分钟检查邮件，自动分类为客服/销售/垃圾邮件，然后在slack里推送回复建议，可以选择批准/编辑/拒绝。

top.author: @vince_lauro
top.text: I’ve been running cron-based AI agents on a Mac Mini for months — email triage, social posting, analytics reports, all recurring. $40/month in API costs, saves 18+ hours/week. Scheduled tasks going native in Claude is huge validation for this pattern.
top.translationZh: 我在Mac Mini上跑基于定时任务的AI代理已经好几个月了——邮件分类、社媒发布、数据报告，全都是循环任务。每月API成本40美元，每周节省18+小时。Claude原生支持定时任务对这种模式来说是个巨大的认可。

top.author: @gyqgtgt
top.text: If you’re open to it, I do paid custom CRM setup/consulting for small teams (lightweight + practical). Quick PM questions: 1) How many active leads/month right now? 2) Need just lead tracking, or also email + invoicing + tasks? 3) Budget target for month 1 (tool + setup)?

top.author: @vince_lauro
top.text: Agree on systems > prompts. I replaced 3 manual workflows last month with AI agents — email triage, social posting, and lead monitoring. Combined they save ~18 hours/week for about $40/month in API costs. The ROI isn't even close. Biggest lesson: automate what you do daily before
top.translationZh: 系统比提示词重要多了。上个月我用AI智能体替换了3个手动流程——邮件分类、社交媒体发布和潜客监控。加起来每周节省大约18小时，API成本才40美元/月。投资回报率根本不是一个量级的。最大心得：先自动化你每天都要做的事情

top.author: @mtayyab_16
top.text: ChatGPT is a tool. Not a system. It can write an email. Summarize a doc. Answer a question. But it can't: → Trigger actions automatically → Connect to your tools → Run while you sleep That's the difference between a tool and automation.
top.translationZh: ChatGPT只是个工具，不是系统。它能写邮件、总结文档、回答问题，但它做不到：→ 自动触发操作 → 连接你的其他工具 → 在你睡觉时运行。这就是工具和自动化的区别。

设置教程：
1. 从应用商店下载 CrookCatcher
2. 打开应用，授予所需权限  
3. 启用"设备管理员"
4. 输入你的邮箱
5. 故意输错PIN码3次来测试
搞定。5分钟的事。

top.author: @netcatinsapce
top.text: Generative AI and coding agents are not "technologies that support people." They are devices that quietly strip away decision-making and implementation, ultimately driving humans into bottlenecks under the guise of supervisors. The more productivity rises, the more the value of
top.translationZh: 生成式AI和编程代理不是什么"辅助人类的技术"。它们是悄悄剥夺决策权和执行权的工具，打着监督者的幌子把人类逼入瓶颈。生产力越高，人的价值就越

top.author: @netcatinsapce
top.text: While LLMs are said to augment human intellectual labor, the reality is an optimization of substitution. In a structure where coding agents write and AI agents make judgments, humans become entities that merely bear "accountability." Productivity rises, but the evolution of
top.translationZh: 虽然大家都说大语言模型是在增强人类的智力劳动，但现实情况其实是在优化替代过程。在编程智能体负责写代码、AI智能体负责做判断的架构下，人类变成了只是承担"责任"的存在。生产效率确实提高了，但进化却...

top.author: @dan_merna
top.text: *connects email* “The only thing AI can do is summarize emails”
top.translationZh: *连接邮箱* "AI唯一能做的就是总结邮件"

top.author: @REDBIKEJohn
top.text: AI Prompt of the Day #3 "Create a 90-day content calendar for [business type] targeting [audience]. Include blog posts, social media, and email topics. Organize by buyer journey stage." One prompt. Three months of content. Zero writer's block. Follow for daily prompts that
top.translationZh: 今日AI提示词 #3："为[业务类型]制作90天内容日历，目标受众是[受众群体]。包含博客文章、社交媒体和邮件主题。按购买旅程阶段分类。" 一个提示词，三个月的内容，告别文案困扰。关注我获取每日实用提示词

top.author: @ghettokenn
top.text: Harvard study says AI increases workload. Yeah — because most people are using it like a fancy autocomplete. Ask it to fix your email. Ask it to summarize a doc. Clean up your slide deck. That's not delegation. That's micromanagement with extra steps. Give it actual jobs.
top.translationZh: 哈佛研究说AI增加了工作量。对啊——因为大多数人都把它当高级自动补全在用。让它修改邮件、总结文档、美化PPT。这不是委派工作，这是多此一举的微管理。给它点真正的活儿干。

top.text: 私は右半身麻痺でガラケーが出たときは腱鞘炎になるくらい打ってました スマートフォンになって私は片手でしか打てないからお母さんにスマホにしたらって言われた時には困ったけど買え変えてメール打つのはアプリを使って携帯打ちをしてます @smilesummit795
top.translationZh: 我右半身瘫痪，翻盖手机刚出来的时候，我打字打到腱鞘炎的程度。后来换智能手机了，我只能用一只手打字，妈妈跟我说换智能手机的时候我还挺困扰的，但买了之后发现发短信可以用app模拟手机键盘输入法 @smilesummit795

top.author: @HowardZhao
top.text: Trying @Filo_Mail and loving it. Summaries + to-dos make email feel lighter. 90 days of Plus for free via my link:
top.translationZh: 试用了一下 @Filo_Mail，真的很棒。邮件摘要加待办事项功能让处理邮件轻松多了。通过我的链接可以免费使用90天Plus版本：

top.author: @coffeebreak810
top.text: 5th place: General Clerical Work AI fully automates email responses, document creation, and data entry. Numerous companies have already replaced it with GPT. The only clerical workers who will remain are those who "can master AI."
top.translationZh: 第五名：一般性文书工作。AI已经能完全自动化处理邮件回复、文档创建和数据录入了。很多公司都已经用GPT替代了这些岗位。唯一能保住饭碗的文员就是那些"会用AI的"。

top.author: @qxgy88
top.text: The future where machines autonomously participate in economic activities is indeed drawing near. The automation of verification and settlement will transform the definition of productivity.
top.translationZh: 机器自主参与经济活动的未来确实正在逼近。验证和结算的自动化将彻底改变我们对生产力的定义。

top.author: @mietekHiding
top.text: this is the shift — Claude moving from 'read my calendar' to 'manage my calendar' on mobile. practical unlock: you're between meetings, you voice-prompt Claude to reschedule a conflicting call and draft a decline email. no app-switching, no typing. the connector doing write
top.translationZh: 这就是转变——Claude从"读取我的日历"升级到在手机上"管理我的日历"。实用场景：你在两个会议之间的空隙，语音指令Claude重新安排一个冲突的电话会议并起草拒绝邮件。不用切换应用，不用打字。连接器开始执行写入操作了

top.author: @dnetsa
top.text: Communicate smarter, not harder. Leverage the #thorAia smart assistant to manage your Email and WhatsApp correspondence with total professionalism. #CustomerService #AI
top.translationZh: 聪明沟通，事半功倍。用 #thorAia 智能助手专业管理你的邮件和WhatsApp消息。#CustomerService #AI

top.author: @JungleJoeJungle
top.text: Those who have not yet taken the Leap of Faith into the great ocean of the unknown within themselves—and who therefore have not yet come to realise and know the sacred essence of Christ—the Soul, Atman, Divine Spark, Buddha Nature, or Ruh (the divine spirit breathed into
top.translationZh: 那些还没有勇敢跳入内心未知深海的人——因此也还没有意识到和认识基督的神圣本质——即灵魂、阿特曼、神圣火花、佛性，或者鲁哈（被吹入的神圣精神
